scripts.publish-dev: aws s3 sync --size-only --delete build/ s3://portalrewrite/ --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=86400000,public && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://portalrewrite/ --metadata-directive REPLACE --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=0,must-revalidate,public --content-type 'text/html; charset=utf-8' && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E7SRM7MJIQ5U5 --paths '/*'
scripts.publish-beta: aws s3 sync --size-only --delete s3://portalrewrite/ s3://fd-prod-portal/ --acl public-read --exclude 'config.json' && aws s3 cp s3://portalrewrite/index.html s3://fd-prod-portal/ && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3CDR9N5RRWKH --paths '/*'
scripts.publish-prod: aws s3 sync --size-only --delete s3://portalrewrite/ s3://fd-prod-portal-com/ --acl public-read --exclude 'config.json' && aws s3 cp s3://portalrewrite/index.html s3://fd-prod-portal-com/ && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2IU4G4IBJUU2Y --paths '/*'
scripts.publish-dev-beta: aws s3 sync --size-only --delete build/ s3://fd-dev-beta-portal/ --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=86400000,public && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://fd-dev-beta-portal/ --metadata-directive REPLACE --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=0,must-revalidate,public --content-type 'text/html; charset=utf-8' && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E30XQLH2EMRJ4W --paths '/*'
